mapper.select: SELECT u.id userId, u.nick_name nickName, u.role_id roleId, r.role_name roleName, p.menu_code menuCode, p.permission_code permissionCode FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = u.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON u.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id AND rp.status='1' WHERE u.user_name = #{userName} AND u.status='1'
SELECT p.permission_code permissionCode FROM sys_permission p ORDER BY p.id
SELECT p.menu_code menuCode FROM sys_permission p ORDER BY p.id
